name: Stickman falling
description:
Crazy stickman physic game.
Tap and hold "Dismount" to play.
- 19 levels
- 3 characters: simple, sport doll, robot
- 9 vehicles
- 9 props
- 3 kits
Use vehicles, props and kits to dismount your stickman and get as many scores as possible.
Don't try this outside of game simulation.
Added Face Capture Mode. You can capture your face and attach it to stickman.
Face Capture Mode needs Camera Permission to take picture.
